snippet: Scientists, writers and other deep thinkers ponder a big question: What scientific idea is ready for retirement? (Hint: Watch yourselves, infinity and the universe.)
abstract: Dennis Overbye Out There column notes compendium of essays questioning validity of widely-accepted scientific concepts; collection, published at edge.org, website created by literary agent and provocateur John Brockman, includes pieces written by 166 well known scientists, thinkers and writers.
lead_paragraph: Scientists, writers and other deep thinkers ponder a big question: What scientific idea is ready for retirement? (Hint: Watch yourselves, infinity and the universe.)

headline.print_headline: Over the Side With Old Tenets
headline.main: Over the Side With Old Scientific Tenets
